revised_title: Hyperfine Structure and Isotope Shift of the 6s6p Level in Tl I
tldr: The authors measured the hyperfine structure and isotope shift of the 6s6p level in Tl I using a 10-meter grating. They found a very large hyperfine interval and a large isotope shift, with the level perturbed significantly in hyperfine structure. The results agree with theoretical expectations and provide insights into the atomic structure of thallium.
